title: Actors and Sin 1952 | Edward G. Robinson, Eddie Albert, Marsha Hunt | Full Movie | Subtitles

sources.title: Actors and Sin 1952 | Edward G. Robinson, Eddie Albert, Marsha Hunt | Full Movie | Subtitles
sources.description:
What goes on when the greasepaint comes off?
Two-part story--the first is about a washed-up Broadway actor and his tough daughter, who is a bigger star than he is; the second is about a literary agent whose newest client--a nine-year-old girl--is the author of a borderline pornographic book.

Original title: Actors and Sin (1952) 

Colorized version https://youtu.be/1NOhnvk6KOE

Directors: Ben Hecht, Lee Garmes
Writer: Ben Hecht
Stars: Edward G. Robinson, Eddie Albert, Marsha Hunt
Genres: Colorized classics, Comedy, Drama
